TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AesManaged extends System.Security.Cryptography.Aes
Public NotInheritable Class AesManaged Inherits Aes
public ref class AesManaged sealed : System::Security::Cryptography::Aes

summary.span: 提供先進加密標準 (AES) 對稱演算法的 Managed 實作。

span.span: Provides a managed implementation of the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) symmetric algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks AES 演算法是基本上 Rijndael 對稱演算法使用固定的區塊大小和反覆項目計數。The AES algorithm is essentially the Rijndael symmetric algorithm with a fixed block size and iteration count. 這個類別函式一樣類別但限制為 128 位元的區塊，並不允許的意見反應模式。This class functions the same way as the class but limits blocks to 128 bits and does not allow feedback modes. > [!NOTE] > 如果 Windows 安全性原則設定為美國聯邦資訊處理標準 (FIPS)-已啟用相容的演算法，使用此演算法會擲回。If the Windows security policy setting for Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS)-compliant algorithms is enabled, using this algorithm throws a . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何加密和解密使用範例資料類別。The following example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt sample data using the class. [!code-csharp[AesManaged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/aesmanaged/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AesManaged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/aesmanaged/vb/program.vb#1)]

span.span: The Windows security policy setting for FIPS is enabled.

exception.span: 此實作不屬於 Windows Platform FIPS 已驗證密碼編譯演算法的一部分。

span.span: This implementation is not part of the Windows Platform FIPS-validated cryptographic algorithms.

summary.span: 取得或設定用來做為回饋的位元數。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of bits to use as feedback.

value.span: 回饋大小 (以位元為單位)。

span.span: The feedback size, in bits.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 回饋大小的上限為 128 位元。The maximum feedback size is 128 bits. > [!NOTE] > 因為這個演算法不支援的意見反應模式，不建議使用這個屬性。Because this algorithm does not support feedback modes, using this property is discouraged.
